### PTCMW/UMBC Career Panel 2020: Panel 
The Personnel Testing Council of Metropolitan Washington (PTCMW) and the University of Maryland Baltimore County (UMBC) I/O Psychology Graduate Program for a career panel and networking event. Panelists will share their defining experiences as I/O Psychologists and offer career advice to students and early career professionals.
